column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ da a Moses wiee ntamadan no si
column3: na ɔseraa ho ngo na ɔtseew ɔno
column4: nye no ho ndzɛmba nyinara
column5: nye afɔrmbukyia no no ho ndzɛmba nyinara ho
column6: na ɔseraa ho ngo na ɔtseew ho no;"

column2: "nna Israel mbapɔmba
column3: hɔn egyanom efi mu etsitsir no
column4: bɔɔ afɔr; iyinom nye ebusuakuw ebusuakuw do asafohen mpanyin
column5: iyinom nye hɔn a wɔhwɛɛ hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn no do no:"

column2: "na wɔdze hɔn ayɛyɛdze baa EWURADZE enyim
column4: nye anantwi duebien; mbapɔmba beenu dze tseaseanam kor
column5: na ɔbaako ɔnantwi kor: na wɔdze baa ntamadan no enyim."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column4: "Gye no wɔ hɔn nsamu
column5: ma wɔmfa nyɛ ehyiadzibuw no ho edwuma; na fa ma Levifo no
column6: dɛ mbrɛ nyimpa biara n'edwuma tse."

column2: "Na Moses gyee ntseaseanam no nye anantwi no na ɔdze maa Levifo no."
"Ntseaseanam ebien nye anantwi anan na ɔdze maa Gerson mbabanyin no
"na ɔdze ntseaseanam anan nye anantwi awɔtwe maa Merari mbabanyin no
column4: wɔ ɔsɔfo Aaron ne babanyin Itamar nsamu."

column2: "Na Kohat mbabanyin no dze ɔamma hɔn bi: osiandɛ ahotseweebea edwuma no yɛ hɔndze; hɔn na wɔsoa no wɔ hɔn mbatsir do."
"Na mbapɔmba no dze afɔrmbukyia oyimadze bae wɔ da a wɔseraa ho ngo no mu
column3: mekyerɛ mbapɔmba no dze hɔn ayɛyɛdze baa afɔrmbukyia no enyim."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ
column4: ɔbapɔmba kor biara wɔ ne da mu
column5: mfa mbɛyɛ afɔrmbukyia oyimadze."

column2: "Na nyia ɔdze n'ayɛyɛdze baa da a odzi kan no nye Aminadab a ofi Juda ebusuakuw mu no ne babanyin Nahson:"
"na n'ayɛyɛdze nye dwetɛboyaa kor
column4: dwetɛkora kor a ɔyɛ dwetɛbona eduosuon
column5: dɛ mbrɛ ahotseweebea dwetɛbona tse: na ebien nyina isiam pa a wɔdze ngo afrɔw dze rekɛyɛ edziban afɔr ayeyɛ no amaama;"

column2: "sika atser kor a ɔyɛ dwetɛbona du a eduhuam ayɛ no ma;"
"ɔnantwisaa eburwa kor
column4: eguambaanyin kor a oedzi afrenhyia a wɔdze rokɔbɔ ɔhyew afɔr;"

column2: "mpɔnkye mu onyin kor a wɔdze rokɔbɔ bɔn ho afɔr;"
"nye asomdwee afɔr dze
column4: nguannyin enum
column5: mpɔnkyenyin enum
column6: nguambaanyin enum a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia: iyi nye Aminadab ne babanyin Nahson n'ayɛyɛdze."

column2: "Da a otsia ebien no Zuar ne babanyin Netanel
column4: dze n'ayɛyɛdze bae."

column2: "N'ayɛyɛdze a ɔdze bae nye dwetɛboyaa kor
column4: dwetɛkora kor a ɔyɛ dwetɛbona eduosuon
column5: dɛ mbrɛ ahotseweebea dwetɛbona tse; ebien nyina isiam pa a wɔdze ngo afrɔw dze rekɛyɛ edziban afɔr ayeyɛ no amaama;"

column2: "sika atser kor a ɔyɛ dwetɛbona du a eduhuam ayɛ no ma;"
"ɔnantwisaa eburwa kor
column4: eguambaanyin kor a oedzi afrenhyia a wɔdze rokɔbɔ ɔhyew afɔr;"

column2: "mpɔnkye mu onyin kor a wɔdze rokɔbɔ bɔn ho afɔr:"
"nye asomdwee afɔr dze
column4: nguannyin enum
column5: mpɔnkyenyin enum
column6: na nguambaanyin enum a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia: iyi nye Zuar ne babanyin Netanel n'ayɛyɛdze."

column2: "Da a otsia ebiasa no Helon ne babanyin Eliab
column3: Zebulunmba mu ɔbapɔmba no dze n'ayɛyɛdze bae."

column2: "N'ayɛyɛdze nye dwetɛboyaa kor a n'ano tow dwetɛbona ɔha eduasa
column3: dwetɛkora kor a ɔyɛ dwetɛbona eduosuon

"nye asomdwee afɔr dze

column5: mpɔnkyenyin enum na nguambaanyin enum a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia: iyi nye Helon ne babanyin Eliab n'ayɛyɛdze."

column3: Efraimmba mu ɔbapɔmba no na ɔbae:"

"n'ayɛyɛdze nye dwetɛboyaa kor

column5: mpɔnkyenyin enum na nguambaanyin enum a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia: iyi nye Okran ne babanyin Pagiel n'ayɛyɛdze."

column2: "Da a otsia duebien no Enam ne babanyin Ahira
column3: Naftalimba mu ɔbapɔmba no ne da a:"

column2: "n'ayɛyɛdze nye dwetɛboyaa kor
column4: dwetɛkora kor a ɔyɛ dwetɛbona eduosuon
column5: dɛ mbrɛ ahotseweebea dwetɛbona tse; n'ebien nyina isiam pa a wɔdze ngo afrɔw dze rekɛyɛ edziban afɔr ayeyɛ no amaama;"

column2: "sika atser kor a ɔyɛ dwetɛbona du a eduhuam ayɛ no ma;"
"ɔnantwisaa eburwa kor
column4: eguambaanyin kor a oedzi afrenhyia a wɔdze rokɔbɔ ɔhyew afɔr;"

column2: "mpɔnkye mu onyin kor a wɔdze rokɔbɔ bɔn ho afɔr;"
"nye asomdwee afɔr dze
column4: nguannyin enum
column5: mpɔnkyenyin enum na nguambaanyin enum a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia: iyi nye Enam ne babanyin Ahira n'ayɛyɛdze."

column2: "Iyi nye afɔrmbukyia no ho oyimadze a ofi Israel mbapɔmba no hɔ bae wɔ da a wɔseraa hɔn ngo no: ndwetɛboyaa duebien
column4: sika ntser duebien:"

column2: "dwetɛboyaa kor n'ano tow dwetɛbona ɔha eduasa
column3: na kora kor biara so yɛ eduosuon: ndzɛmba no no dwetɛ nyinara yɛ dwetɛbona mpemebien ahaanan
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ahotseweebea dwetɛbona tse;"

column2: "sika ntser a eduhuam ayeyɛ no amaama duebien
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ahotseweebea dwetɛbona tse: ntser no ne sika nyinara yɛ dwetɛbona ɔha eduonu:"

column2: "ɔhyew afɔr anantwi no nyinara yɛ anantwisaa duebien
column4: nguambaanyin a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia no duebien; mpɔnkye mu enyin a wɔdze rokɔbɔ bɔn ho afɔr duebien:"

column2: "Na asomdwee afɔr anantwi no nyinara yɛ anantwisaa eduonu anan
column4: mpɔnkyenyin no eduosia na nguambaanyin a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia no eduosia. Iyi nye afɔrmbukyia no no ngosera ekyir oyimadze."

column2: "Na aber a Moses hɛɛn ehyiadzibuw no mu dɛ ɔnye no rekɛkasa no
column3: nna ɔtsee ndze a ɔrekasa kyerɛ no fi mbɔbɔrhu egua a ɔwɔ dasedaka no do no do
column4: wɔ kerobim ebien no ntamu: na ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ no."
